contextInitialized(ServletContextEvent) - Method in class utilities.ControlClass

control - Variable in class utilities.Experiment
A control interface object (what actually gets assigned here is a ControlClass object, but for future revisions any object that extends ControlInterface can be used)
ControlClass - Class in utilities
Hard-Coded Control classes should extend HardCodedControlClass.
ControlClass(String) - Constructor for class utilities.ControlClass
Constructor that takes the experiment ID as a parameter.
ControlClass(String, String, String, String, boolean) - Constructor for class utilities.ControlClass
 
ControlClass.RBNBControl - Class in utilities
This inner class is meant to provide the base functionality for classes that extend HardCodedControlClass Normally, an experiment will extend HCCC and have an inner class that extends HCCC.RBNBControl This way, the experiment specific code only has to override the run() and include the necessary control logic within that method where all the backend processes (connecting to RBNB, sending commands) are handled by this class
ControlClass.RBNBControl() - Constructor for class utilities.ControlClass.RBNBControl
 
controlExists - Variable in class utilities.Experiment
Boolean true if the control has been assigned, false otherwise
controlFileName - Variable in class utilities.Experiment
The filename as it appears in the web app (/WEB-INF/classes/experiments/...)
ControlInterface - Interface in interfaces
Interface for writing control programs.
